# ğŸ‘‹ Welcome to anchorpipe Discussions!

## What is anchorpipe?

**anchorpipe** is an intelligent flaky test detection and remediation platform. It helps development teams identify, understand, and fix flaky tests that slow down CI/CD pipelines and reduce confidence in test suites.
